nodes.text: Lisa Nandy : I would hate for anybody, particularly those of you who bravely and rightly stood up for our country and stood alongside Afghans and helped to deliver those gains, to come away with the sense that we are anything other than absolutely proud of those achievements and determined to do everything that we can in these most difficult of circumstances to defend them
Asserting

Lisa Nandy would hate for anybody, particularly those of you who bravely and rightly stood up for our country and stood alongside Afghans and helped to deliver those gains, to come away with the sense that we are anything other than absolutely proud of those achievements and determined to do everything that we can in these most difficult of circumstances to defend them

Manos: Lisa Nandy : I would hate for anybody, particularly those of you who bravely and rightly stood up for our country and stood alongside Afghans and helped to deliver those gains, to come away with the sense that we are anything other than absolutely proud of those achievements and determined to do everything that we can in these most difficult of circumstances to defend them
Lisa Nandy
Lisa Nandy : There is a generation of young Afghans that grew up with a transformation in what they could expect from their futures
Asserting
there is a generation of young Afghans that grew up with a transformation in what they could expect from their futures
Manos: Lisa Nandy : There is a generation of young Afghans that grew up with a transformation in what they could expect from their futures
Lisa Nandy : They learned languages, they studied all over the world, they took those skills back to Afghanistan, and put them to good use making a contribution, and they got access to education
Asserting

the generation of young Afghans learned languages, they studied all over the world, they took those skills back to Afghanistan, and put them to good use making a contribution, and they got access to education

Manos: Lisa Nandy : They learned languages, they studied all over the world, they took those skills back to Afghanistan, and put them to good use making a contribution, and they got access to education

Lisa Nandy : They're watching the future unravel in front of their eyes

Manos: Lisa Nandy : They're watching the future unravel in front of their eyes
Lisa Nandy : We owe it to them not to engage in a counsel of despair, but to think what can we do right now to assert leverage over the situation and protect those gains
Asserting
we owe it to the generation of young Afghans not to engage in a counsel of despair, but to think what can we do right now to assert leverage over the situation and protect those gains
